title: Paris Liberated; Allied defeat at Arnhem
description: As Paris falls to the Allies and German resistance in Italy falters, the defeat at Arnhem in the Netherlands is a major setback for the Allies. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:subtitle: The defeat at Arnhem in the Netherlands is a major setback for the Allies.
itunes:summary: As Paris falls to the Allies and German resistance in Italy falters, the defeat at Arnhem in the Netherlands is a major setback for the Allies. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
